startPageTitle: Tell Companies House you have verified someone’s identity
useThisService: Use this service to tell us when you've verified someone's identity for Companies House.
whatYoullNeedPersonHeading: What you'll need to tell us about the person
youllNeedToTellUsTheir: You’ll need to tell us their:
theEmailCanOnlyBeUsedOnce: The email address you give can only be used once to verify someone’s identity. We'll use this to send their Companies House personal code.
whatIsACompaniesHousePersonalCode: What is a Companies House personal code?
thisIsACharacterCode: This is an 11 character code that is given to a person once they’ve verified their identity.
itCanBeUsedToConnect: It can be used to connect a person's verified identity to our records.
whatYoullNeedIdentityHeading: What you'll need to tell us about the identity checks
theChecksYouCompleteMustMeet: The checks you complete must meet
thisListsWhichDocuments: This lists which documents the person needs to provide and the checks you need to do to verify their identity.
ifTheDocumentsWereCheckedBullet: if the documents were checked by a person, or using identity document validation technology (IDVT)
theDatesYouCompletedIDChecksBullet: the date you completed the identity checks
forMostDocuments: For most documents, you'll also need to provide some information from the document itself. You will not need to provide this information for any of the documents listed in 'group B' in the standard.
whereRelevantYoullNeedToProvide: Where relevant, you'll need to provide the:
documentReferenceBullet: document reference – for example, you’ll need to give the passport number if you checked their passport
expiryDateBullet: expiry date, if the document has one
countryOfIssueBullet: country of issue, if the document has one
youDoNotNeedToUploadCopies: You do not need to upload copies of the documents you checked. However, you will need to keep records of the identity checks, including copies of the documents. We may ask to see these records.
suspendOrStopBusinessWarningText: We could suspend or stop your business from acting as an authorised agent if you have not met our identity verification standard.
startTimeout: It takes around 10 minutes to use this service.
guidanceAboutVerifyingLink: guidance about verifying someone's identity for Companies House
